Item Creation Process: Crafting · Design · Fabrication · Materials · Production
Design Types: Tools · Clothing and Jewelery · Containers


The most common type of "tool" in most MMORPGs are Weapons. However, this should not be taken to mean that many items have other uses to which they are better dedicated. A Carpenter's axe may make a fine weapon, but it is still kept because it is useful to his craft. Similarly, the hammers necessarry for Masons, Miners, and Blacksmiths are can serve as weapons.
